title: Enhancing System Design Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning Strategies for Adopting Electronic Learning Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in language education and basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the core elements of the Technology Acceptance Model (TAM)—perceived usefulness and perceived ease of use—within the context of language education.
Learners can evaluate facilitating conditions (FC) and work-life quality (WLQ) influencing the acceptance of e-learning systems in mobile environments.
Learners can propose improvements for e-learning systems applicable to real-world language education settings through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
